ygData.subject: Fuah!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: The following updates have been made to the Test Server. - The Plane of Fear population has been fully revamped with new NPCs and items. *****- Pottery has
ygData.messageBody:
The following updates have been made to the Test Server.

- The Plane of Fear population has been fully revamped with new NPCs and items.
*****- Pottery has been enhanced, such that the profitability of certain items has
been altered.*****
- The ability to make poison has been activated, in addition, a number of components
required for the Make Poison skill has been placed.
- Though, the Test Server will be patched again on Saturday (tomorrow) to complete
the first installment of Make Poison changes.
- A number of quests have been both enhanced and added.
- The ability to report player whom are harassing has been implemented. This is done
by typing "/report" - the previous 10 lines of text will be saved to the server for
Customer Support representatives to review. This command may only be performed once
while on-line, you must then log out and back in to use it again.

Everyone, start making those damn pie tins NOW!!!!
